Whip egg whites with sugar in 3 additions until soft peaks (wet foam).

Fold meringue into yolk mixture in three parts. Pour into tray and gently tap to remove air.
蛋白分三次切拌入蛋黄糊中，倒入烤盘轻震几下。
Bake at 180°C for about 18 minutes. Adjust time based on your oven.
180°C烘烤18分钟左右，视烤箱调整。
Remove and invert onto cooling rack. Peel off parchment.
出炉后倒扣放凉，撕去油布。
While still warm, roll cake with help of rolling pin to shape.

Whip cream with sugar until stiff. Unroll cake, spread cream, and add sliced strawberries.

Melt chocolate with coconut oil, mix in hazelnuts.
隔水融化巧克力，加入椰子油和榛子碎。
Pour glaze over cake, refrigerate another 30 minutes before slicing.
淋在蛋糕卷上，冷藏半小时后切块。

title: Excel VBA Sales Management Tool
text:
A simple, automated Excel-based solution for effortless sales tracking, data entry, and visualization

The Story Behind This Project
This project started as a way to help my mom. She runs a small online store, managing every transaction manually in Excel. Since she’s not very familiar with technology, she spends hours inputting and organizing sales data, which is time-consuming and exhausting. I wanted to create something that would simplify her work, reduce the manual effort, and help her focus on what matters—growing her business and taking care of her health.
That’s how the Excel VBA Sales Management Tool was born. This tool automates data entry, ensures accuracy, and provides instant visual insights, making sales management faster, easier, and more efficient.


Key Benefits

Efficient Sales Data Management – Simplifies record-keeping with structured data entry and validation.

Dynamic Customization – Easily modify fields and parameters to adapt to business needs.

Automated Visual Insights – Instantly generate interactive charts to monitor sales trends.

Seamless Excel Integration – Built with VBA, leveraging Excel’s capabilities for smooth automation.



Features
✅ Dynamic Column Management – Add or modify data fields directly from the UI.
✅ Real-time Data Validation – Prevents errors by enforcing correct input formats.
✅ Batch Data Entry – Speed up workflows with multi-entry support.
✅ Automated Chart Generation – Instantly create bar charts, line graphs, and more.
✅ User-Friendly Interface – Designed for ease of use with minimal manual effort.
🔗 GitHub Repository: excel-ledger
🚀 Tech Stack: Excel, VBA

title: Stock Forecasting: A Machine Learning Exploration
text:
This project focused on applying and comparing various machine learning models for stock price prediction to gain hands-on experience.
The Stock Forecasting project is a hands-on exploration of machine learning models applied to stock price prediction. Developed using R, it utilizes libraries such as quantmod, forecast, and tidyverse to facilitate data manipulation, visualization, and model implementation. This project emphasizes practical skill development in time series analysis, financial data processing, and predictive modeling, using a range of models.

Purpose

Gain practical experience with various time series models.
Develop skills in analyzing and visualizing stock data trends.
Practice evaluating the performance of different forecasting models.
Enhance proficiency in R for machine learning applications.



Key Features

✅ Data Gathering – Automates stock data collection from Yahoo Finance using quantmod.
✅ Feature Engineering – Calculates technical indicators like Bollinger Bands, MACD, and RSI.
✅ Multiple Model Implementation - Includes ARIMAX, NNETAR, XGBoost, and GARCH models for forecasting.
✅ Combined Model - Implements a combined model to potentially improve forecast accuracy.
✅ Model Evaluation – Assesses model performance using metrics such as MAPE and MSE.
✅ Comparative Analysis – Compares the performance of the different forecasting models to identify effective strategies.
✅ Visualization – Generates plots to visualize stock prices, technical indicators, and model forecasts.

🔗 Step-by-step file
🔗 Visualized file
🚀 Tech Stack: R, tidyverse, lubridate, quantmod, tseries, forecast, tsibble, fable, fabletools, feasts, xgboost, caret, rugarch

title: Personal Memo System – SQL, React & Python
text:
A full-stack web application designed to help users organize, track, and analyze personal data across domains like health, finance, habits, and goals. The system integrates structured data storage, analytics, and automation to provide a seamless digital assistant for self-management.


🔍 Purpose
To offer a secure, user-friendly system for storing and organizing memos, tracking custom metrics, and generating meaningful insights through automation and data visualization. This project highlights full-stack development with MySQL, FastAPI, React, and Python for real-world applications in personal productivity and life organization.



🚀 Key Features

✅ FastAPI Backend – High-performance RESTful API for managing entries, metrics, users, categories, and tags.
✅ MySQL & SQLAlchemy – Reliable relational database for structured, secure data storage.
✅ React Frontend (TypeScript) – Interactive and customizable dashboard for memo entry, browsing, and metric visualization.
✅ Advanced Analytics – Python-powered insights with Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn: trends, summaries, and visualized metrics.
✅ Automation Tools – Scheduled database backups, audit logs, and progress tracking features.
✅ Category & Tag-Based Organization – Clean structure to keep data discoverable and meaningful.
✅ Metric Tracking System – Visualize personal goals over time, with scatter plots, summary stats, and trend lines.
✅ User Authentication – Secure access via JWT-based login system.
✅ Responsive UI – Built with Tailwind CSS and Material-UI for a sleek and responsive experience.




🧰 Tech Stack

Backend: FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, Redis, MySQL

Frontend: React (TypeScript), Chart.js, Axios, Material-UI

Automation & Analysis: Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn

Others: JWT, Docker, Tailwind CSS




💡 Highlights

Real-time analytics and metric trend tracking

Modular architecture with clean API versioning

Swagger UI API docs for easy exploration (/docs)

Customizable dashboards and flexible metric definitions

Fully deployable on a virtual machine or cloud server


🔗 GitHub Repository: MemoTrack-SQL
This project is a comprehensive demonstration of modern full-stack engineering—merging data management, frontend interactivity, backend scalability, and Python-based automation into a single cohesive system.

title: WeChat Chat Bot
text:
A Python-based chatbot for WeChat, integrating OpenAI’s API for AI-powered conversations.
The WeChat Chatbot enhances WeChat interactions by providing AI-driven conversational responses in real time. Built with Python, it leverages wxauto for WeChat automation and OpenAI’s API for intelligent, context-aware replies. This project showcases expertise in chatbot development, automation, and large language model (LLM) integration.

Purpose

Automate conversational responses using AI.

Maintain context for more relevant and coherent interactions.

Demonstrate Python-based WeChat automation and LLM API integration.



Key Features
✅ OpenAI Integration – AI-driven responses with conversation history management.
✅ WeChat Automation – Auto-retrieves and processes messages using wxauto.
✅ Context-Aware Conversations – Builds conversation context dynamically for better responses.
✅ Background Processing – Runs a background process for real-time message handling.
The chatbot functions as an AI assistant for WeChat, streamlining communication with automated, intelligent responses. It is designed to work with PC WeChat version 3.9.11.17.
🔗 GitHub Repository: ChatBot_WeChat
🚀 Tech Stack: Python, OpenAI API, wxauto, threading, logging
This project is a hands-on practice in AI-driven automation, chatbot development, and NLP-enhanced user interactions.

将苹果、圣女果和熟鸡肉切块。
Combine kale, chicken, apple, grape tomatoes, and goat cheese in a bowl.
将羽衣甘蓝、鸡肉、苹果、圣女果和山羊奶酪放入碗中。
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Toss to combine and serve.
淋上香醋和橄榄油，搅拌均匀即可食用。
